intro: Stroganowia leventii var. pilosa, commonly known as the hairy stroganowia, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to the temperate regions of Asia. The plant is characterized by its upright stems and broad, lance-shaped leaves that are covered in fine, hairy texture.
